title: Kimezou no Kimarimonku Ja Kimaranee. Featuring Sabu-Otoko
synopsis: Follows the story of young employee of a company that produces star-shaped confections. The unusual man views society cynically and does not fit typical Japanese competitive male stereotypes. He has to contend with a variety of coworkers including the flamboyant Kimezou, the company president, and the president's daughter. (Source: ANN)
